item.description: @AmazonHelp You have missed them terribly. You misplaced 2 orders, delayed by 2 days. And then your support says it will take another 3 days. This is with the one-day delivery promise on both orders.
item.source:markdown: @AmazonHelp You have missed them terribly. You misplaced 2 orders, delayed by 2 days. And then your support says it will take another 3 days. This is with the one-day delivery promise on both orders.

item.description: The quality of @amazonIN's prime delivery has significantly degraded in recent times. Two orders in two days that were out of delivery were marked as "attempted delivery" when the agents didn't even arrive at our houses. The delivery agency's found a loophole they are milking.
item.source:markdown: The quality of @amazonIN's prime delivery has significantly degraded in recent times. Two orders in two days that were out of delivery were marked as "attempted delivery" when the agents didn't even arrive at our houses. The delivery agency's found a loophole they are milking.

item.description: Here‚Äôs a word cloud of my posts that I created in 2008 ‚Äì I had been blogging for around 2 years then. I find it funny that even then I was writing the most about ‚Äúblog‚Äù. Apparently, meta-commentary never goes out of fashion. https://t.co/2fO2zPgP6z

item.description:
I understand why Google is doing the #GetTheMessage campaign. I also understand why it would hardly affect Apple. It‚Äôs a loss for users all over the world though. https://t.co/tKNXfdeAyb

Is Apple breaking my texting experience? No, hardly anyone uses SMS anymore. Would I love a standard? Absolutely.

item.description: I find it surprising that iTunes remain the only good store to buy digital music even today. There has to be some reason that all the big players have exited the space and have gone the streaming route. Is it the competition? Or the overall logistics of selling digital music?
item.source:markdown: I find it surprising that iTunes remain the only good store to buy digital music even today. There has to be some reason that all the big players have exited the space and have gone the streaming route. Is it the competition? Or the overall logistics of selling digital music?

item.description: It was 10 years ago today that I began a seven-day challenge not to log in to Facebook. I haven‚Äôt seen that timeline since then. It was a good, eye-opening challenge in that sense. Nice!
item.source:markdown: It was 10 years ago today that I began a seven-day challenge not to log in to Facebook. I haven‚Äôt seen that timeline since then. It was a good, eye-opening challenge in that sense. Nice!

item.description:
We sometimes write sentences that don‚Äôt need to exist. Hidden in a paragraph, we might not notice. Standing on their own, we notice. Delete any sentence not worthy of its own line.

Source: Writing one sentence per line | Derek Sivers ‚Üí https://t.co/VUQ1tUFGVX
item.source:markdown:
We sometimes write sentences that don‚Äôt need to exist. Hidden in a paragraph, we might not notice. Standing on their own, we notice. Delete any sentence not worthy of its own line.
Source: Writing one sentence per line | Derek Sivers ‚Üí https://t.co/VUQ1tUFGVX
